name: Flip The Bottle Challenge
description:
Flip the bottle through the kitchen room onto various objects and flying cats keeping it in motion, until you land it perfectly on the target.

Collect gems in every level to unlock new bottles!

Try not to fall down!! If you miss just small landing the game is over.
You have to start again from the beginning of the level.

Conquer more than 20 super challenging levels on your way to become the master of Flip the Bottle challenge.

It's not impossible. You just need to believe in your skills,
Try it NOW!
